verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation_en: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
Arise and warn
verses.translation_zh: 你应当起来，你应当警告，

verses.translation_en: And your Lord glorify
And your clothing purify
And uncleanliness avoid
And do not confer favor to acquire more
But for your Lord be patient.
verses.translation_zh: 你应当为你的主而坚忍。

verses.translation_en: And when the trumpet is blown,
That Day will be a difficult day
verses.translation_zh: 在那时，将有一个艰难的日子。

verses.translation_en: For the disbelievers - not easy.
verses.translation_zh: 那个日子对不信道的人们，是不容易渡过的。

verses.translation_en: Leave Me with the one I created alone
verses.translation_zh: 你让我独自处治我所创造的那个人吧！

verses.translation_en: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
And children present [with him]
And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
Then he desires that I should add more.
verses.translation_zh: 而他还冀望我再多加赏赐。

verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，他确实是反对我的迹象的，

verses.translation_en: I will cover him with arduous torment.
Indeed, he thought and deliberated.
So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
verses.translation_zh: 但无论他怎样计划，他是被弃绝的。

verses.translation_en: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
verses.translation_zh: 无论他怎样计划，他终是被弃绝的。

verses.translation_en: Then he considered [again];
Then he frowned and scowled;
Then he turned back and was arrogant

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation_en: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
verses.translation_zh: 而且说：这只是传习的魔术，

verses.translation_en: This is not but the word of a human being."
I will drive him into Saqar.
And what can make you know what is Saqar?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道火狱是什么？

verses.translation_en: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
verses.translation_zh: 它不让任何物存在，不许任何物留下，

verses.translation_en: Blackening the skins.
Over it are nineteen [angels].

verses.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةً وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًا وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation_en: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
verses.translation_zh: 我只将管理火狱的成天神，我只以他们的数目，考验不信道的人们，以便曾受天经的人们认清，而信道的人们更加笃信；以免曾受天经的人们和信道的人们怀疑；以便心中有病者和不信道者说：真主设这个譬喻做什么？真主这样使他所意欲的人误入迷途，使他所意欲的人遵循正路。只有你的主，能知道他的军队，这只是人类的教训。

verses.translation_en: No! By the moon
And [by] the night when it departs
And [by] the morning when it brightens,
Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
As a warning to humanity -

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation_en: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
verses.translation_zh: 警告你们中欲前进者或欲后退者；

verses.translation_en: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
verses.translation_zh: 各人将因自己的营谋而作抵押，

verses.translation_en: Except the companions of the right,
[Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
verses.translation_zh: 他们在乐园中互相询问，

verses.translation_en: About the criminals,
[And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
verses.translation_zh: 你们为什么堕入火狱呢？

verses.translation_en: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
Nor did we used to feed the poor.
And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
verses.translation_zh: 我们与妄言的人们一道妄言，

verses.translation_en: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
Until there came to us the certainty."
verses.translation_zh: 一直到死亡降临了我们。

verses.translation_en: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
verses.translation_zh: 说情者的说情，将无益於他们。

verses.translation_en: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
verses.translation_zh: 他们怎么退避这教训呢？

verses.translation_en: As if they were alarmed donkeys
verses.translation_zh: 他们好像一群惊慌的驴子，

verses.translation_en: Fleeing from a lion?
verses.translation_zh: 刚逃避了一只狮子一样。

verses.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation_en: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
verses.translation_zh: 不然，他们中的每个人都希望获得一些展开的天经。

verses.translation_en: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，他们不畏惧后世！

verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
verses.translation_zh: 真的，这《古兰经》确是一个教诲！

verses.translation_en: Then whoever wills will remember it.

verses.text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation_en: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
verses.translation_zh: 他们只因真主的意欲而记忆它。他是应受敬畏的，他是宜於赦宥的。
